column1: Introducing ConTextual: How well can your Multimodal model jointly reason over text and image in text-rich scenes?|"PublishedMarch 5
column2: 2024"|" ConTextual is a Context-sensitive Text-rich Visual reasoning dataset for evaluating LMMs. It covers 8 real-world visual scenarios - Time Reading
column9: Infographics and Miscellaneous Natural Scenes. The dataset includes a reference response for each instruction
column10: allowing us to test various evaluation methods."|"https://huggingface.co/blog/leaderboard-contextual"

column1: StarCoder2 and The Stack v2|"Published February 28
column2: 2024"|" StarCoder2 is a family of open LLMs for code and comes in 3 different sizes with 3B
column3: 7B and 15B parameters. The flagship StarCod2-15B model is trained on 4 trillion tokens and 600+ programming languages from The Stack v2."|"https://huggingface.co/blog/starcoder2"

column1: AI Watermarking 101: Tools and Techniques|"Published February 26
column2: 2024"|" There are two methods for watermarking AI-generated content: the first occurs during content creation and the second is implemented after the content is produced. Some tools that imperceptibly alter images include Glaze and Photoguard. Other tools include Nightshade and Fawkes."|"https://huggingface.co/blog/watermarking"

column1: Fine-Tuning Gemma Models in Hugging Face|"Published February 23
column2: 2024"|" Parameter Efficient FineTuning (PEFT) for Gemma models is a popular technique to accomplish this at low cost. The PEFT library provides an easy abstraction that allows users to select the model layers. This can greatly accelerate the fine-tuning speed."|"https://huggingface.co/blog/gemma-peft"

column1: Welcome Gemma - Googleâ€™s new open LLM|"Published February 21
column2: 2024"|" The Gemma is a family of 4 new LLM models by Google based on Gemini. It comes in two sizes: 2B and 7B parameters
column3: each with base (pretrained) and instruction-tuned versions. All variants  can be run on various types of hardware
column5: and have a context length of 8K tokens."|"https://huggingface.co/blog/gemma"
